foragingMinerals.name: Quartz
foragingMinerals.description: A clear crystal commonly found in caves and mines.

foragingMinerals.name: Earth Crystal
foragingMinerals.description: A resinous substance found near the surface.

foragingMinerals.name: Frozen Tear
foragingMinerals.description: A crystal fabled to be the frozen tears of a yeti.

foragingMinerals.name: Fire Quartz
foragingMinerals.description: A glowing red crystal commonly found near hot lava.

foragingMinerals.name: Emerald
foragingMinerals.description: A precious stone with a brilliant green color.

foragingMinerals.name: Ruby
foragingMinerals.description: A precious stone that is sought after for its rich color and beautiful luster.

foragingMinerals.name: Topaz
foragingMinerals.description: Fairly common but still prized for its beauty.

foragingMinerals.name: Prismatic Shard
foragingMinerals.description: A very rare and powerful substance with unknown origins.

foragingMinerals.name: Copper
foragingMinerals.description: A common ore that can be smelted into bars.

foragingMinerals.name: Iron
foragingMinerals.description: A fairly common ore that can be smelted into bars.

foragingMinerals.name: Gold
foragingMinerals.description: A precious ore that can be smelted into bars.

foragingMinerals.name: Iridium
foragingMinerals.description: An exotic ore with many curious properties. Can be smelted into bars.

foragingMinerals.name: Coal
foragingMinerals.description: A combustible rock that is useful for crafting and smelting.
